item.title: UK Reportedly Withdraws Demand to Access Encrypted iCloud User Data
item.description: The British government has agreed to withdraw its controversial demand to access Apple users’ encrypted iCloud data, according to the U.S. director of intelligence. Tulsi Gabbard said in a post on X (
